src:
Skor 30-29, Ahsan/Hendra ke Perempat Final Fuzhou China Open
07 Nov 2019, 16:41 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ahsan/Hendra lolos ke perempat final dengan kemenangan 30-29 di gim penentuan. (Dok. Humas PBSI)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Mohammad Ahsan/Hendra Setiawan lolos ke babak perempat final Fuzhou China Open 2019 setelah menaklukkan Ou Xuanyi/Zhang Nan, 11-21, 21-18, 30-29.Ahsan/Hendra lambat panas di awal pertandingan. Mereka tertinggal 0-9 dari Ou/Zhang.Selisih sembilan poin itu yang menyulitkan Ahsan/Hendra untuk bangkit dan mengejar ketinggalan. Ou/Zhang tak terhentikan untuk meraih kemenangan di gim pertama dengan skor 21-11.Memasuki gim kedua, permainan Ahsan/Hendra lebih baik dibandingkan gim pertama. Ahsan/Hendra mampu mengimbangi perolehan poin Ou/Zhang. Kedua ganda bergantian unggul sampai akhirnya Ahsan/Hendra memimpin satu angka, 11-10 di saat interval.Selepas interval, Ahsan/Hendra mampu melepaskan diri dari kejaran Ou/Zhang. Ahsan/Hendra mampu memimpin 15-12 dan berlanjut menjadi 18-16.Ahsan/Hendra sempat mendapat tekanan saat Ou/Zhang mampu menyamakan kedudukan menjadi 18-18. Namun Ahsan/Hendra lalu memberikan respons bagus dengan torehan tiga poin beruntun yang membuat skor 21-18 dan laga berlanjut ke gim ketiga.Pertarungan sengit terjadi di gim ketiga. Di awal gim ketiga, Ahsan/Hendra lebih sering mengendalikan perolehan angka dan unggul dua poin, 11-9 saat interval.Ahsan/Hendra lalu ada di atas angin saat unggul 17-12. Namun situasi sulit terjadi saat Ou/Zhang merebut lima poin beruntun yang membuat skor sama kuat 17-17.Ganda China itu sendiri lebih dulu meraih match point di angka 20-19 namun mampu digagalkan oleh Ahsan/Hendra.Pertarungan sengit mencapai klimaksnya di saat setting. Kedua ganda bergantian meraih match point. Pertandingan akhirnya usai setelah Ahsan/Hendra memenangkan poin terakhir dan menyudahi pertandingan dengan skor 30-29. (ptr)
text:
Score 30-29, Ahsan / Hendra to the Fuzhou China Open Quarterfinals
Nov 7 2019, 16:41 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ahsan / Hendra qualified for the quarter-finals with a 30-29 win in the deciding game. (PBSI Public Relations Doc.)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Mohammad Ahsan / Hendra Setiawan qualified for the quarterfinals of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 after conquering Ou Xuanyi / Zhang Nan, 11-21, 21-18, 30-29. Ahsan / Hendra was slow to heat up early in the match. They left behind 0-9 from Ou / Zhang. The nine-point difference makes it difficult for Ahsan / Hendra to get up and catch up. Ou / Zhang are unstoppable to win in the first game with a score of 21-11. Entering the second game, Ahsan / Hendra's game is better than the first game. Ahsan / Hendra is able to compensate for Ou / Zhang points. The two doubles took turns leading until finally Ahsan / Hendra led one point, 11-10 at the interval. After the interval, Ahsan / Hendra was able to break away from the pursuit of Ou / Zhang. Ahsan / Hendra was able to lead 15-12 and continued to 18-16. Ahsan / Hendra was under pressure when Ou / Zhang was able to equalize to 18-18. But Ahsan / Hendra then gave a good response with a score of three consecutive points that made the score 21-18 and the game continued into the third game. A fierce fight occurred in the third game. At the beginning of the third game, Ahsan / Hendra more often controlled the acquisition of numbers and two points ahead, 11-9 at intervals. Ahsan / Hendra then had the upper hand when winning 17-12. But a difficult situation occurred when Ou / Zhang won five consecutive points that made the score as strong as 17-17. The Chinese double itself first won the match point at number 20-19 but was able to be thwarted by Ahsan / Hendra. The fierce fight reached its climax when setting . The two doubles take turns reaching match points. The match finally ended after Ahsan / Hendra won the last point and ended the match with a score of 30-29. (ptr)
